title: Workshop-Based Problem-Solving Process Utilizing Learning Design and Instructional Modeling Language

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of instructional design and foundational digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: A course focused on applying instructional design methodologies in scientific domains for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Analyze and improve real educational scenarios in the sciences using the IMS Learning Design (IMS LD) model.
Propose lifecycle management strategies for learning design (planning-execution-evaluation-improvement) through workshop-based collaborative activities.
Implement effective learning design in constrained technological environments using smartphone-based tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
